answers.answer: Natural in my opinion. with my son I had an all natural birth that last 36 hours but he was 6 pounds 3 ounces. With my daughter I had to have an emergency c-section which had complications making it for their that I'd always have to have c sections. With my son then I'm pregnant with now I'll have to have a c-section at 36 weeks its more uncomfortable longer recovery time and harder on the body. You're having a full abdominal surgery where the terror open your stomach muscles to get to your uterus. It's as much much much longer and more painful  recovery time.

All c sections are different I have had two and both were different..it depends on how strong you are as to how bad your recovery is my first one was awful but I lost my daughter so I was weak and depressed but my second was a breeze I was strong refused to have anything stronger then ibuprofen after I got out of recovery..so to me it depends!
But if I had an option with this one it would be vaginal but I have to have a c section.

question: I'm going to be 36 when I deliver my 5th n last baby. I've had natural births with all 4 (8lbs 4oz-8lbs 8oz- 10lbs- 10lbs 10oz) my last two were big n I didn't have gestational diabetes with any of my babies.  I had long n extremely painful labor with last two n longer recovery time. I'm scared of having this one natural in case she's a big baby to n I'm thinking of c section but don't know what to do. Natural or c section?
title: c section vs natural??
